Control.Text: Welcome to BGChron. As a reminder, this is a beta release. If you run into any issues with the add-on, please leave a comment at http://wildstar.curseforge.com/ws-addons/221713-bgchron with details about what you were doing when the error occurred. Thank you and enjoy!
Control.Name: Window

Control.Text: BGChron will record all of your PvP matches as you play. To view detailed statistics for a match, just double click the match you want to view.
Control.Name: Window1
